title: New: aiwake – Crescent Lane
body:
Another slice of emotional R&B from **aiwake** marks their first release of 2018.

_Crescent Lane_ again draws from the likes of SOHN and the more expressive, experimental moments from James Blake, yet manages to exist within a space solely its own. Glitchy, trip-hop inspired stuff, it’s glowingly ambitious. Check it out below.

excerpt.full: Another slice of emotional R&B from aiwake marks their first release of 2018. Crescent Lane again draws from the likes of SOHN and the more expressive, experimental moments from James Blake, yet manages to exist within a space solely its own. Glitchy, trip-hop inspired stuff, it’s glowingly ambitious. Check it out below.
